vg-padding-remover

Removes padding from svg files. Requires [PhantomJS](http://phantomjs.org/).

## Demo

Before:

<img style="border: 1px solid red;" width="100px" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,">

After:

<img style="border: 1px solid red;" width="86px" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,">

## Installation

PhantomJS is required:

```
npm install -g phantomjs-prebuilt
```

Then just use it to run `svg-padding-remover.js`.

## Usage

```
phantomjs svg-padding-remover.js path/to/image.svg > new.svg
```

## Thanks
